name: PresidentBensonTalks
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: president benson talks
des: Select talks from Ezra Taft Benson, 13th President of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints. Talks include 'Beware of Pride' - read by President Gordon B. Hinckley, 'To the Children of the Church' - read by President Thomas S. Monson, 'To the Single Adult Sisters of the Church', 'I Testify', 'Flooding the Earth with the Book of Mormon', 'To the Single Adult Brethren of the Church', 'Come unto Christ, and Be Perfected in Him' and 'The Great Commandment—Love the Lord'.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
